content:
CompSci 269S, Fall 2006: Theory Seminar

The Theory Group meets Fridays at 1:00pm; this quarter we are in ICS 253. Below is this quarter's schedule.

Sep 29: Organizational Meeting
Oct 6: cancelled
Oct 13: Josiah Carlson, Simultaneous Source Location problem on Trees
Oct 20: Nodari Sitchinava, Guards Placement for Wireless Localization
Oct 27: cancelled
Nov 3: Matt Nguyen, On maximizing welfare when utility functions are subadditive
Nov 10: Veteran's Day observed at UCI
Nov 17: Michael Nelson, High-Assurance Searching in Distributed Data Structures
Nov 24: Thanksgiving break
Dec 1: Kevin Wortman, Cache-oblivious dynamic programming

Previous quarters' theory seminars
